summary: The RaceMenu preset (and a few additional things) for my Link.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://github.com/cubeguy/cube_repo/raw/master/ModPageAssets/RaceMenu%20Preset/Header.png[/img][/center][right][i][size=1][color=#ffd966]Mod page made for new Nexus layout.[/color][/size][/i][/right]I've always been one to make my character myself and of course spend a hell of a lot of time on it, and as for Link, there... really aren't any decent options people have made out there, not that I've see anyway.  So here it is, by request from another mod of mine [s]and after way too long[/s], the RaceMenu preset (and a few additional things) for my Link.

[img]https://github.com/cubeguy/cube_repo/raw/master/ModPageAssets/RaceMenu%20Preset/Nexus_PrimaryPageImage.png[/img]
[size=1]([i]Iron Armour used for demonstrative purposes.[/i])[/size]
[center][img]https://github.com/cubeguy/cube_repo/raw/master/ModPageAssets/Prerequisites.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] (+ its own requirements)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachii Sky Hair [b]Male v1.2 Hair for Elves[/b]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows
[/url][url=https://www.vectorplexus.com/index.php?/files/file/25-sam-pretty-face-for-male-textures/]SAM Pretty Face for Male Textures[/url]
[url=https://www.vectorplexus.com/index.php?/files/file/10-sam-shape-atlas-for-men/]S.A.M. available on vectorplexus.com[/url] (Body mod)
[size=1][color=#444444]I do actually have slightly customized textures for this as well...[/color]
[/size]


[size=3][b][img]https://github.com/cubeguy/cube_repo/raw/master/ModPageAssets/RaceMenu%20Preset/OtherModsIUsed.png[/img]
[/b][/size][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85898/]Hylian Shield[/url] / [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84997/?]Replacer Version[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85900]Master Sword Glow Replacer[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40615/?]Relics of Hyrule[/url][/size]
[b] [/b]


[size=3][b][img]https://github.com/cubeguy/cube_repo/raw/master/ModPageAssets/RaceMenu%20Preset/HowToUse.png[/img][/b][/size]
[size=2]Install with MO/NMM.[/size]
Once in-game, open RaceMenu (showracemenu in console), select race High Elf.
Click on the preset tab in RaceMenu and load preset "Link_HighElf.jslot".
Job done.[/center]

[img]https://github.com/cubeguy/cube_repo/raw/master/ModPageAssets/Credits.png[/img]
• Naxmaardur and Ionil — original version of scar textures
author: cube_guy
